key_risks: Ongoing litigation related to construction defects and land use disputes
High sensitivity to U.S. housing market conditions, including interest rates and consumer demand
Supply chain disruptions and cost fluctuations impacting profit margins
controversies: Legal disputes over construction defects and shoddy workmanship
Labor violations, including misclassification of employees and denial of overtime pay
Involvement with contractors linked to labor trafficking scandals
environmental_issues: Legal disputes over environmental representations and compliance
Concerns about the environmental impact of construction practices despite sustainability initiatives
social_issues: Allegations of labor trafficking and unethical supply chain practices
Criticism over employment practices, including wage violations and worker misclassification
governance_issues: Reputational damage from ongoing litigation and ethical controversies
Potential regulatory penalties due to labor and environmental compliance issues
